SEARCH
Package com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.service

Class TradeService

java.lang.Object
com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.service.TradeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericService<Trade>
@Service public class TradeService extends Object implements GenericService<Trade>
Service class responsible for handling operations related to Trades. Provides methods for CRUD operations, mapping, and managing trade data.
